channel.title: Science on AIXWIM
channel.description: Recent content in Science on AIXWIM

item.title: How Diamond Prices Are Determined: Understanding the Factors That Affect Diamond Value
item.description: Learn how diamond prices are determined, from the cost of rough diamonds to the final retail price, and the role of certification and grading.

item.title: How Diamonds Are Mined: Understanding the Mining Methods
item.description: Learn about the two main methods of diamond mining: Pipe Mining and Alluvial Mining, and how diamonds make their way from the earth to your jewelry.
